Mitsuki stretches his arm, causing it to go into and out of the ground many times before finally grabbing his opponent's leg. He pulls his opponent through the tunnels created by his arm and throws them high up in the air, still holding onto them, and spins his arm rapidly, to the point of creating a hurricane, before smashing the opponent against the ground.
